body: Francesco We, the men of science don't like mysteries. Do we? So the area that being multiplied is the area of all the faces that you get when you deconstruct the meshes coming out of analysisMesh output. I have again attached the example demonstrating how the component is calculating the total Sun light hours. This should work at your end as well. For your other questions as to why this calculation is done this way, perhaps Mostapha can share his point of view.
